channel.title: Generative Modeling on Nithya Shikarpur
channel.description: Recent content in Generative Modeling on Nithya Shikarpur

item.title: Interactive Music Generation Experiments
item.description: Research Abstract In Hindustani music, a tradition of North Indian Classical music, the melody is loosely constrained by the chosen composition but otherwise largely improvised in accordance with the raga grammar which are often realized at different levels of abstraction and conformity [ 1 , 2 ].

item.title: The Syntonauts: AI Song Contest 2022
item.description: I participated in the AI Song Contest 2022 along with some friends.
